attributes.action: Take CSA & Spousal maintainance payments into account when calculating EMA elebility
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have one son living with me, I pay my ex almost 1/2 my income in CSA & Spousal maintainance payments. This is completely ignored -- the Dept of education counts that 16k as if it was money the came into my household; it does not. There must be plenty others like me who are being double penalised.
